title: Chinese Chicken and Chestnut Stew
ingredients: ['Chicken Marinade', '1/2 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 tablespoon light soy sauce or 1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '1-2 tablespoons cornflour, mixed with 1 tablespoon water', '450g chicken, cut into chunks', '8 dried shiitake mushrooms, soaked, stems removed', 'Mushroom Marinade', '1 dessertspoon caster sugar', '1 dessertspoon soy sauce', '1 dessertspoon sesame oil', 'Sauce', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '2 tablespoons black soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon sugar', '2 tablespoons shaoxing wine', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon finely chopped garlic', '20 fresh chestnuts, shelled', '1 (400g) tin straw mushrooms', '2 spring onions, cut into 2.5cm pieces', '1 tablespoon finely chopped shallots', '2 slices fresh ginger', 'hot water, as needed']
